entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, 9.8°C

Visibility: 16.1 km

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of rain or drizzle. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of rain or drizzle beginning near midnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming northeast 20 overnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow mixed with rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Periods of snow or rain mixed with drizzle ending in the morning then cloudy. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming north 30 late in the morning. High 6. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023
